title: Just wondering what font this is...
content:
The font appeals to the cartoonist in me. Just wondering what it is. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wufoo404.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20110218134554/http:/typophile.com/files/wufoo404.png) | 9.15 KB |
author: desktop

comments.content: I did post this in the right place, didn't I?
Yep. Doesn't ring a bell with me. People don't usually post when they don't know. I guess whoever has seen it so far doesn't know.
Mark, thanks for letting me know.
Wow, I wonder if I've stumped the Typophile community? lol

Stephen, thanks. I'm partial to Billy.

I wrote Wufoo and the site owner just emailed me back and said he was checking into it for me. When he let's me know I will post about it here.

[P22 Peanut Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20110218134554/http:/new.myfonts.com/package/278277/) came to mind, but it's closer to something like the [Calvin and Hobbes](http://web.archive.org/web/20110218134554/http:/www.dafont.com/calvin-and-hobbes.font) font.

It looks a lot like Burbank too [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/burbankcollection](http://web.archive.org/web/20110218134554/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/burbankcollection "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/burbankcollection")
